name: SLANG (Tim Buhrs)
description:
In this relaxing new take on Snake you slither your way through a calming maze and try to become your ultimate self by devouring a variety of adorable flies!
 You have a choice to either go against the clock or against yourself to try and achieve the highest of highscores! ( post your highest score in the comments )

Controls:
You can move the snake by using either
the A and D keys
 or
the Left and Right Arrow keys

I made this game in a little over 3 hours for the Trijam #155 and I'm so happy how it turned out considering this is my first 2D game!
All the art was created specifically for this project, aswell as most of the code (excluding basic menu code that i copied from other projects).

The music and sound effects where from various sources such as sound packs and royalty free music sites.
Music by: Podington Bear
